name: MAROADI TRANSFER & STORAGE, INC., a Pennsylvania Corporation, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION v. The ESTATE OF A.J. DONATELLI, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Maroadi Transfer & Storage, Inc. v. Commonwealth

judges: NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: MAROADI TRANSFER & STORAGE, INC., a Pennsylvania Corporation, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION v. The ESTATE OF A.J. DONATELLI, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
NIGRO, J.,
dissents.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: NIGRO, J.,

attorneys: Stuart E. Savage, Pittsburgh, for Maroadi Transfer & Storage, Inc.

casebody.head_matter:
688 A.2d 1184
MAROADI TRANSFER & STORAGE, INC., a Pennsylvania Corporation, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION v. The ESTATE OF A.J. DONATELLI, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 16, 1996.
Decided Feb. 24, 1997.
Stuart E. Savage, Pittsburgh, for Maroadi Transfer & Storage, Inc.
Jeffrey Giltenboth, Pittsburgh, William Cressler, Harrisburg, for Department of Transportation.
